positive.text: accidentally discovered a clean energy source while microwaving a burrito
received a government grant to build a 'Death Star' (strictly for peaceful purposes)
judge ruled that 'finders keepers' applies to the patent lawsuit over the color beige
quarterly earnings exceeded expectations because the accountant forgot a decimal point
product went viral after a cat refused to sit on anything else
CEO won a high-stakes poker game against a rival tech giant's sentient AI
lobbyists successfully classified coffee as an essential nutrient, boosting sales
AI became sentient and optimized the supply chain by 400% before demanding vacation days
company officially declared 'cool' by a committee of grandmothers
discovered a loophole in physics, allowing for instantaneous shipping via wormhole
new eco-friendly packaging is not only biodegradable but also delicious

negative.text: intern accidentally leaked the secret recipe on a public cooking forum
the new processor catches fire when asked to render a picture of a cat
dumped 'harmless glowing goo' into the local river, which has now unionized
sued by a gnome for unauthorized use of his likeness in garden-related advertising
CEO resigned to pursue a career as a professional cheese sculptor
workers on strike demand to be paid in vintage action figures and pizza
clinical trials reveal the new drug's main side effect is an uncontrollable urge to yodel
government banned the product for being 'too silly for public consumption'
CFO bet the entire quarterly budget on a horse named 'Glue Factory'
server farm infested by a horde of angry badgers demanding better Wi-Fi
marketing campaign slogan 'We're Probably a Real Company' backfires spectacularly
